scripts.test: mkdir -p coverage && NODE_ENV=test ./node_modules/nyc/bin/nyc.js --reporter=text-lcov --reporter=html mocha spec/server_spec.js > coverage/coverage.lcov
scripts.testRunningServer: mkdir -p coverage && NODE_ENV=test ./node_modules/nyc/bin/nyc.js --reporter=text-lcov --reporter=html mocha spec/server_spec_against_running.js > coverage/coverage-running.lcov
scripts.docker-run: docker run --log-driver json-file --log-opt max-size=10m --log-opt max-file=4 -p 8081:8081 --name cqm-execution-service -d tacoma/cqm-execution-service
